fullText: The musical 'Rain' may have the look and sound of a Beatles tribute band, but it aspires to something more: a theatrical experience that captures the excitement and artistry of the Fab Four's live performances.
dtliExcerpt: The musical 'Rain' may have the look and sound of a Beatles tribute band, but it aspires to something more: a theatrical experience that captures the excitement and artistry of the Fab Four's live performances.
bwwExcerpt: Consider it enhanced karaoke, like a collective night in front of a giant television playing the new Beatles video game, but without requiring the kind of hand-eye coordination and technological savvy so vexing to the middle-aged....All appear to be having a good time and succeeded in giving the enraptured audience at the performance I caught a good time, too.
